translations: v．签名，亲笔签名：在书籍、照片、纪念品等上面写上自己的名字，作为纪念或证明。
· The author is autographing copies of his book at the bookstore.
作者正在书店为他的书签名。

phrs.translation: 你不是在网上面放了相片

sentences.sentence: Unfortunately, you guys will not be able to get the album earlier to learn the songs, but you will get it on Thursday, and I will be autographing all of them, alright?
sentences.translation: 对不起，在这个之前你们拿不到我的专辑，不过我保证一定会让每一个人都拿到我的签名，ok？
